article_title: How each province and territory has shaped Canada’s fight against the coronavirus
article_description: Across Canada  each province and territory is grappling with its own combination of geography and travel patterns   and has responded with its own public health measures   all of which have shaped the spread of COVID 19
article_content: When it comes to preventing the spread of coronavirus  we re all in this together   Yet  when it comes to Canada  each province and territory stands somewhat alone Each is grappling with its own combination of geography and travel patterns   and has respon   22123 chars
